column2: an A.M. Eatery////2.  Regardless of the way you're greeted by the people at the host station
column3: they're supposed to seat you.  There were two employees at the entrance when I walked in.  One looked at me
column5: then went back to talking to the other.  Since the two customers in front of me had also just walked in without assistance
column6: I figured that's what I was supposed to do.  In hindsight
column7: this is probably what caused a lot of the service issues today.
